updates.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
updates.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.

updates.title: The AI healthcare gold rush is here
updates.description: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about hallucination risks, inaccurate medical information, and […]

updates.title: OpenAI and Anthropic are making their play for healthcare, and we’re not surprised
updates.description: AI companies are clustering around healthcare, and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for Health, and Sam Altman-backed Merge Labs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. updates.title: Introducing three new tools for precise image editing in Figma
updates.description: Today we’re introducing three new AI image editing tools that make precision editing faster, cleaner, and more intuitive—powering a more complete creative workflow in Figma.

updates.title: Three new features to help build brand momentum with Figma Buzz
updates.description: With marketing templates that are now connected to your design system, plugins that pull in your favorite apps, and video trimming in Figma Buzz, we’re giving designers and marketers new tools to create branded assets that speak volumes.

updates.title: Senior Designer, Moniker, San Francisco
updates.description:
Moniker is looking for a Senior Designer 100% focused on visual identity work: concepting and designing brand systems that can scale across complex organisations, digital products, and real-world environments. This role is hands-on, highly collaborative, and ideal for someone who is as comfortable defining a core visual idea as they are building out the details of a system so it
The post Senior Designer, Moniker, San Francisco appeared first on BP&O - Branding, Packaging and Opinion.

updates.title: Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
updates.description: Musk's legal team argues he should be compensated as an early startup investor who sees returns "many orders of magnitude greater" than his initial investment.

updates.title: AI cloud startup Runpod hits $120M in ARR — and it started with a Reddit post
updates.description: Their startup journey is a wild example of how if you build it well and the timing is lucky, they will definitely come.
